overview:
Erik Johnson is CTO of eCert. With deep experience in IT and the financial services industry, Johnson has spent more than 20 years developing technology infrastructure and global enterprise and security solutions, including a decade as Senior Vice President of Enterprise Technology & Delivery at Bank of America.

At Bank of America, Johnson led teams responsible for global enterprise secure electronic messaging, social collaboration technology architecture, and global enterprise e-mail design for more than 250,000 employees and thousands of business-to-business relationships.
